typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_col0_} as string,
		{_col1_} as string,
		{_col2_} as string,
		{_col3_} as string,
		{_col4_} as string,
		{_col5_} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['fourthcoffee/Movies.csv']) ~> FourthCoffee
source(output(
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_ts} as integer,
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as timestamp,
		genre as string,
		id as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as short,
		runtime as short,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		tier as short,
		title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> CosmosDB
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
FourthCoffee, CosmosDB join({_col0_} == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
